question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press next to begin.

The following questions relate to your usual sleep habits during the past month only. Your answers should indicate the most accurate reply for the majority of days and nights in the past month. Please answer all questions.
1. During the past month, what time have you usually gone to bed at night? (hour:minutes AM/PM)
2. During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?
3. During the past month, what time have you usually gotten up in the morning?  (hour:minutes AM/PM)
4. During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night? (This may be different than the number of hours you spent in bed.)
For each of the remaining questions, check the one best response. Please answer all questions.

5. During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you . . .

a) Cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: b) Wake up in the middle of the night or early morning
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: c) Have to get up to use the bathroom
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: d) Cannot breathe comfortably
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: e) Cough or snore loudly
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: f) Feel too cold
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: g) Feel too hot
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: h) Had bad dreams
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: i) Have pain
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: j) Other reason(s), please describe:
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: j) How often during the past month have you had trouble sleeping because of this?
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: 6. During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall?
option_text: Very good, Fairly good, Fairly bad, Very bad

question_text: 7. During the past month, how often have you taken medicine to help you sleep (prescribed or "over the counter")?
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: 8. During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activity?
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: 9. During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?
option_text: No problem at all, Only a very slight problem, Somewhat of a problem, A very big problem

question_text: 10. Do you have a bed partner or room mate?
option_text: No bed partner or room mate, Partner/room mate in other room, Partner in same room but not same bed, Partner in same bed

question_text: If you have a room mate or bed partner, ask him/her how often in the past month you have had . . .
a) Loud snoring
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: b) Long pauses between breaths while asleep
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: c) Legs twitching or jerking while you sleep
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: d) Episodes of disorientation or confusion during sleep
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: e) Other restlessness while you sleep; please describe:
e) please choose how often.
option_text: Not during the past month, Less than once a week, Once or twice a week, Three or more times a week

question_text: Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
